title: # 472 - Greg Fitzsimmons, Mike Gibbons & ME
description:
Today I sit down with comedians Greg Fitzsimmons and Mike Gibbons. We talk about divorce, shooting “The Cabin” with Mike, cat calling, favorite bits from other comics, working on Ellen, and much more! 

 

Check out Greg and Mike’s Podcast “Sunday Papers” wherever you get yours! 

 

This episode is brought to you by Liquid IV. Get 25% off when you go to http://www.liquidiv.com and use the code “Bert” at checkout. 

 

This episode is brought to you by CBD Direct Oils. Go to http://www.cbddirectoils.com and use code BERT to get 10% off all orders.

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
